story.title: 255th anniversary of opening
story.description: Some highlight tweets from the day...

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.

quote.text: Congratulations @britishmuseum on attracting 6.7 million visits in 2013! http://t.co/Puf6KSKxi2

image.caption: #onthisday 255 years ago the Museum first opened to the public! See how we've changed since http://t.co/xqbK6SzV7c http://t.co/ZrudAMQQ2A

quote.text: #onthisday 255 years ago the Museum first opened to the public! See how we've changed since http://t.co/xqbK6SzV7c http://t.co/ZrudAMQQ2A

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. #BeyondElDorado http://t.co/f5sCnQdBIO #VikingExhibition http://t.co/LzxhceemZ3 #Ming50Years http://t.co/RY9aCl9MKl
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: #onthisday 255 years ago the Museum first opened to the public! See how we've changed since http://t.co/xqbK6SzV7c http://t.co/ZrudAMQQ2A

quote.text: There's a great Google doodle today. Happy birthday, @britishmuseum!
Happy 255th anniversary to the Family Friendly @britishmuseum! What has been your favourite activity there?

image.caption: British Museum enjoys most successful year ever.. a very Happy Birthday! http://t.co/XKLFzau9t2 http://t.co/bk8SyNgk4R

quote.text: British Museum enjoys most successful year ever.. a very Happy Birthday! http://t.co/XKLFzau9t2 http://t.co/bk8SyNgk4R

image.caption: Today our #GoogleDoodle celebrates the 255th anniversary of the @britishmuseum in London: http://t.co/XBqrzyODK2 http://t.co/H3qpR5nQXZ

quote.text: Today our #GoogleDoodle celebrates the 255th anniversary of the @britishmuseum in London: http://t.co/XBqrzyODK2 http://t.co/H3qpR5nQXZ
Happy 255th anniversary to @britishmuseum!

image.caption: 250,000 thank yous to our 1/4 of a million followers! Here‚Äôs a suitable banknote to celebrate http://t.co/zg2l9Sq5tK http://t.co/feBeIr00mq

quote.text: 250,000 thank yous to our 1/4 of a million followers! Here‚Äôs a suitable banknote to celebrate http://t.co/zg2l9Sq5tK http://t.co/feBeIr00mq

image.caption: What a day for @britishmuseum: a google doodle, most visitors ever, and 255 today. http://t.co/KCnpa8D1QX http://t.co/HaKzxHq5IB

quote.text: What a day for @britishmuseum: a google doodle, most visitors ever, and 255 today. http://t.co/KCnpa8D1QX http://t.co/HaKzxHq5IB

image.caption: Happy birthday, @britishmuseum! 255 years young, eh? http://t.co/IxT0POD5Rq

quote.text: Happy birthday, @britishmuseum! 255 years young, eh? http://t.co/IxT0POD5Rq
Happy 225th anniversary @britishmuseum BIG fan!

image.caption: Happy 225th Birthday to the @britishmuseum! Have a smashing day and year from all at JW! Loving the Google doodle! http://t.co/Bno9EtHJ76

quote.text: Happy 225th Birthday to the @britishmuseum! Have a smashing day and year from all at JW! Loving the Google doodle! http://t.co/Bno9EtHJ76
.@britishmuseum celebrates its 255th anniversary today - happy birthday from all @royalacademy, we're loving your Google Doodle!

image.caption: Thanks for the follow @britishmuseum coincidently your our 250th follower! 1000 of us = 1 British Museum? #oneday http://t.co/UiVCpjr1Nx

quote.text: Thanks for the follow @britishmuseum coincidently your our 250th follower! 1000 of us = 1 British Museum? #oneday http://t.co/UiVCpjr1Nx
Happy 255th Birthday, @britishmuseum! http://t.co/QrcEPOkA9U http://t.co/ju1E5IXAxP

image.caption: Happy birthday! 255yrs old and still lookin good MT @britishmuseum: #onthisday 255 years ago the Museum first opened! http://t.co/UfYhgK8EOo

quote.text: Happy birthday! 255yrs old and still lookin good MT @britishmuseum: #onthisday 255 years ago the Museum first opened! http://t.co/UfYhgK8EOo

image.caption: Happy 255th b'day to the @britishmuseum! From mid-19th cen, the Library occupied the famous circular BM Reading Room. http://t.co/L7kfyOYQ9x

quote.text: Happy 255th b'day to the @britishmuseum! From mid-19th cen, the Library occupied the famous circular BM Reading Room. http://t.co/L7kfyOYQ9x
Happy 255th birthday to @britishmuseum!
@britishmuseum Congratulations! Many greetings from Paris
Everyone say a big happy birthday to our friends @britishmuseum - 255 years today! Fingers crossed for a Rosetta Stone cake #MuseumBirthday
Happy 255th Birthday to @BritishMuseum. We would make some joke about you being a fossil but instead we'll say we love your #googledoodle!

image.caption: Here's a 1890s photo from our collection to say happy anniversary to the @britishmuseum, opened 255 years ago today http://t.co/623pmcxuWV

quote.text: Here's a 1890s photo from our collection to say happy anniversary to the @britishmuseum, opened 255 years ago today http://t.co/623pmcxuWV
@britishmuseum happy bday. My parents first met there over 50yrs ago. Mum was one of your bookbinders. Dad a stonemason worked on your roof.
Happy 255th birthday @britishmuseum we love your #googledoodle more museums should have them!
Happy 255th anniversary to our friend down the road, the @britishmuseum!!
The British Museum at 255: a Google doodle for the world's open university http://t.co/qxaUPuGWJa @guardianculture
British Museum, @britishmuseum is now trending in #Manchester http://t.co/5GXXG5ag4y
We love, love, LOVE the @BritishMuseum doodle on @google today. Absolutely fab http://t.co/YDdTu6lcZN
A very happy 255th birthday @britishmuseum! We're very much looking forward to your Vikings exhibition.

image.caption: Happy 255th birthday, @britishmuseum! Thank you for sharing the cinematic magic with us http://t.co/BKVjzhoY5n

quote.text: Happy 255th birthday, @britishmuseum! Thank you for sharing the cinematic magic with us http://t.co/BKVjzhoY5n

image.caption: On its 255th anniversary, we round up the British Museum's top 5 masterpieces http://t.co/7ufJ8TLYf7 http://t.co/qGMk0T1JrF

quote.text: On its 255th anniversary, we round up the British Museum's top 5 masterpieces http://t.co/7ufJ8TLYf7 http://t.co/qGMk0T1JrF
Happy birthday @britishmuseum! Fortnightly visits to the Greek section were the highlight of my classics A levels. Here's to another 255yrs!

image.caption: The British Museum was first opened #OnThisDay in #history, 15 January 1759. http://t.co/Is5z7mfJOp @britishmuseum http://t.co/PJV6Z5kQDQ

quote.text: The British Museum was first opened #OnThisDay in #history, 15 January 1759. http://t.co/Is5z7mfJOp @britishmuseum http://t.co/PJV6Z5kQDQ
It's the @britishmuseum's 255th Birthday. Imagine the candles on that cake! #LiveyoungJanuary
Happy 255th anniversary @britishmuseum! Here's an #Aerofilms aerial view of the Museum in 1946: http://t.co/LEW6GPw4VN
@britishmuseum Happy birthday. My first job was in the preservation dept of the original British Library. The SW quadrant book stacks -scary
